svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_11_4) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/51.0.2704.103 Safari/537.36" version="5.5.2.3" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram></diagram></mxfile>

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 56px; max-width: 126px; width: 126px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Every vertex and every fragments sees the same values for uniforms

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 36px; max-width: 126px; width: 126px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 56px; max-width: 126px; width: 126px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: The vertex shader specifies values for each varying per-vertex

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 96px; max-width: 126px; width: 126px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: In the fragment shader, values of varyings are interpolated between the values for the surrounding vertices

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 66px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.div:
Influenced by mode argument in drawArrays, e.g.
GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP
